HodoscopeEventDataBlock.cc

00001 #include "HodoscopeEventDataBlock.hh"
00002 
00003 namespace CALICE {
00004 
00005 
00006 HodoscopeEventDataBlock::HodoscopeEventDataBlock() : _hitMapsCreated(false) {/*no op*/}
00007 
00008 void HodoscopeEventDataBlock::storeHitMaps(std::vector<int> &hitVecX, std::vector<int> &hitVecY) {
00009   obj()->setIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX, static_cast<int>(hitVecX.size())); 
00010   obj()->setIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsY, static_cast<int>(hitVecY.size())); 
00011   int ihit(0);
00012   //Fill the hits in x direction
00013   for( std::vector<int>::iterator veciter=hitVecX.begin(); veciter!=hitVecX.end(); veciter++) {
00014     ihit++;
00015     //std::cout << "storing xvalue: " << std::hex << static_cast<int>((*veciter)) << std::dec << std::endl;
00016     obj()->setIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+1+ihit, static_cast<int>((*veciter))); 
00017   }
00018   
00019   //Fill the hits in y direction
00020   for( std::vector<int>::iterator veciter=hitVecY.begin(); veciter!=hitVecY.end(); veciter++) {
00021     ihit++;
00022     obj()->setIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+1+ihit, static_cast<int>((*veciter))); 
00023   }
00024   
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 void HodoscopeEventDataBlock::createHitMaps() {
00030   
00031   //Build the actual Hit Maps
00032   //X direction
00033   for(unsigned int ihitx=0; ihitx < getNumHitsX(); ihitx++) {
00034     //channel = (getIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+2+ihitx) >> HODCHANNELSHIFT) & 0xffffffff;
00035     //value =    getIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+2+ihitx) & 0xffffffff;
00036    _hitMapX[(getIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+2+ihitx) >> HODCHANNELSHIFT) & 0xffff]=getIntVal(kHodEvtNumHitsX+2+ihitx) & 0xffff;  
00037   } 
00038   
00039   //Y direction
00040   int iposy(kHodEvtNumHitsY+getNumHitsX());
00041   for(unsigned int ihity=0; ihity < getNumHitsY(); ihity++) _hitMapY[(getIntVal(iposy+1+ihity) >> HODCHANNELSHIFT) & 0xffff]=getIntVal(iposy+1+ihity) & 0xffff;    
00042   
00043   _hitMapsCreated=true;
00044 }
00045 
00046   void HodoscopeEventDataBlock::print(std::ostream& os) {
00047   
00048   //Check whether the hitmaps have been created
00049   if(!_hitMapsCreated) createHitMaps();
00050 
00051   //Print what we know about the hodoscope data for this event
00052   os << " Hodoscope - Status (hex): " << std::hex << getStatusWord() << std::dec << std::endl;
00053   os << " Hodoscope - Event Counter: " << getEventCounter() << std::endl;
00054   os << " Hodoscope - Time Counter: " << getTimeCounter() << std::endl;
00055   os << " Hodoscope - Hits in x direction: " << getNumHitsX() << std::endl;
00056   for(HodoscopeHitMap_t::iterator hodmapiter=_hitMapX.begin(); hodmapiter != _hitMapX.end(); hodmapiter++) os << "Hit in X - Channel: " << (*hodmapiter).first << " Value: " << (*hodmapiter).second << std::endl;
00057   std::cout << " Hodoscope - Hits in y direction: " << getNumHitsY() << std::endl;
00058   for(HodoscopeHitMap_t::iterator hodmapiter=_hitMapY.begin(); hodmapiter != _hitMapY.end(); hodmapiter++) os << "Hit in Y - Channel: " << (*hodmapiter).first << " Value: " << (*hodmapiter).second << std::endl;
00059   }
00060 
00061 }
